name: Project SGG
description:
A sprawling adventure full of puzzles, peril, and really weird goblins!

Features:

  • Over 4 levels!
  • At least 4 bosses!
  • Cute goblins!
  • Basketball?!
Patch notes (important!)

The HTML5 version of the game embedded on Itch has a very minor, but frustrating bug: the ending of the game fails to load! I have made one patch to the game which fixes this, but to play the patched version you will either have to download the desktop version, or use this alternate link to play the web version. Nothing else about the gameplay was changed, so I suggest you play that version of the game instead of the build embedded above.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift (or right click) to dash
  • Left click to fire lasso towards cursor
Credits:

Garuda Ramuda - Art, Programming, Boss design, Level design

KP - Programming, Sound, Music, Level design

Noah Ataya - Additional assets
